faq.question: What is your return policy?
faq.answer: You can return any item within 30 days of purchase as long as it is in its original condition and packaging.

faq.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faq.answer: Yes, we ship internationally. Shipping costs and delivery times vary based on the destination.

faq.question: How can I track my order?
faq.answer: Once your order is shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email to monitor your package's status.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and Apple Pay.

faq.question: How do I contact customer support?
faq.answer: You can reach our support team via email at support@example.com or call us at +1 234 567 890.
